description: An HTML source file implementing the user interface for a database viewer dashboard, including styles, layout, and client-side JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database information, tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of available databases from the backend API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the available databases.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database and loads table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and inserts an HTML table with fetched data into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell for a given data value, handling objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content that is too long or is an object.
